topics.body:
Whelp; Ukraine is about to hit the fan.

Heat signatures during the time of the airplane that crashed points towards it being shot down; the thing is though the rebels didn't have access towards to surface to air missiles, the Ukranians didn't shoot it down. . . so yeah you can tell where this is going.


. . . Also urghhhhh. . . Guess who is most likely to win the republican nomination in 2016?  Either Huckabee, Paul, Ryan or Perry. . Time to break out the booze.

topics.body:
"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c910606368727e67610700#post_53c910606368727e67610700
It's funny in a tragic way that whoever shot it was a idiot and didn't realize that surface to air missiles' flight paths can be tracked.  Considering that it was shot down in rebel territory that's going to raise a lot of questions:
"So rebel's representative, where did you get the surface to air missile?"
"You're lying it was shot down by loyalists"
"Let's try this again; the flight path of the surface to air missile that shot down the plan came from your forces"
"That's bs"
"Let's try this again; where did you get the missile?"
"Any and all military equipment we have was confiscated from Ukrainian loyalist forces"
"Let's try this again; all surface to air missiles of the Ukrainian forces are accounted for and not a single one is missing"
". . . Err. . uhhhh we managed to take it from Ukrainian forces?"
"Let's try this again; who gave you the missile?"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
One of my favorite things in the world is when an actor shifts between something aimed at adults, and something aimed at kids. I love that Tara Strong did Drawn Together and MLP because frankly I'm easily amused.

That in mind, Chris of Dan Vs. is voiced by Dave Foley, an alumnus of one of my favorite sketch comedy groups, Kids In The Hall. Really, I just want you all to know that Chris "has a good attitude towards menstruation.":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ppuMaQ4hZE4
